name: Black Box Jumper
description:
Black Box Jumper is Simple platformer game with Black and White graphics. 

Each level has to be done in given time which is displayed in top middle of the game.

It's my first game made with GameMaker studio.i will continue updating this game even after the game jam. 

There are still a few bugs but they shouldn't affect the gameplay. 

If you find a bug please describe it in the comments and tag it with #BBJbug

Feel free to explore the game's source files: GitHub link
